args.[command]: (Optional) The command to get help for.

mc?help.message: Lists all commands and their usage.

mc?info.message: Shows bot version and system information.

args.[server number]: (Optional) The number of the server to get the status for. When omitted, shows all servers.

mc?status.message: Shows the status and player count for all servers, or the specified server.

args.[ip:port]: (Optional) The IP address and port of the server (e.g. `play.hypixel.net:25565`)

mc?add.message: Adds a new server to the bot. If no arguments are given, a creation wizard is created.

args.<server number>: The number of the server to remove.

mc?remove.message: Removes a server from the bot.
